example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 出) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (NP-PN (NR 云林) (NR 斗六)) (NP (NN 车站))))) (PU ，) (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 吴宗升)) (VP (VP (VP (VV 驾) (AS 著) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR TOYOTA))) (VP (VV 奔驰) (PP (P 在) (LCP (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 宽广))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 县道))) (LC 上))))) (PU ，) (VP (PP-DIR (P 向) (NP (LCP (NP (NN 海)) (LC 边)) (NP (NN 老家)))) (VP (VV 急驰)))))
